description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=3/3, Mature Content=3/3. Aphelion Episode 2 Wings of Omega features 5 playable character, tons of skills, quests, fast-paced dungeons, NewGame+ and a lot more! The 6+ hour story continues and Savion must contend with enemies on two fronts as you unravel who the true orchestrator is of the attack on Earth!
